method.name: cols
method.digest: Set the number of columns of the matrix
method.description: Set the number of columns of the matrix

method.name: born
method.digest: Set the number of alive neighbors a dead cell should have to become alive
method.description: Set the number of alive neighbors a dead cell should have to become alive

method.name: surv
method.digest: Set the number of alive neighbors an alive cell should to remain alive
method.description: Set the number of alive neighbors an alive cell should to remain alive

method.name: muta
method.digest: Invert the state of n random chosen cells
method.description: Invert the state of n random chosen cells

method.name: fill
method.digest: Randomly fill the the matrix, optionally specify the fill probability
method.description: Randomly fill the the matrix, optionally specify the fill probability

method.name: rows
method.digest: Set the number of rows of the matrix
method.description: Set the number of rows of the matrix

method.name: cell
method.digest: Set a cell to the desired value
method.description: Set a cell to the desired value
